text.content:
If __container count in user namespaces__ is zero, it means the cluster is idle.

If in user namespaces,  __container CPU utilization__ is low (e.g. < 1%), the cluster is **likely** idle.

__Note:__ User namespace is any namespace except __kube-system__, __istio-system__, __gatekeeper-system__, __gke-system__. If needed, you can update the filter in the charts.

Despite what is selected in the Time Period at the top, reports are computed based on the last 7 days.

You can edit the dashboard and modify the query if you want to change durations such as **_7 days_** to the time window you want. 

You can also filter and sort the values in the charts.

If a container restarted by GKE, it will be counted more than once since the container instances are different.
